title: The Saint: TV Series & Movies Archive

sources.title: The Saint: TV Series & Movies Archive
sources.description: Archive of the tv series and movies featuring the popular character The Saint by Leslie Charteris. This archive contains the following movies: Movies: -The Saint (1997) -The Saint (2017) TV Series -The Saint (1962-1969) - 6 seasons -Return of the Saint (1978-1979) - 1 season Uploaded for archival purposes. I will be slowly uploading this archive as I live in a third world country and my internet is garbage. So if something is missing wait a bit. UPDATES: 10/10/2022: Finally added Return of the Saint. It took no joke like 6 hours to upload so I'm dreading the 6 Seasons of The Saint. Alas, the show must go on! 21/10/22: It took like 2 days and a lot of my bandwith but the complete series of The Saint has been uploaded! It is done AFAIK. If anything is missing please do send me a message. Cheers and have fun!
